pages.text: An item used to copy configuration data from one machine to another.$(p)To copy data to the card, $(k:sneak) + $(k:use) on the source machine, then $(k:use) the destination machine. Chat messages will inform you of the success/failure.

Supported machines: $(li)$(l:machines/digital_miner)Digital Miner$(/l) $(li)$(l:storage/energy_cubes)Energy Cubes$(/l) $(li)$(l:machines/formulaic_assemblicator)Formulaic Assemblicator$(/l) $(li)$(l:machines/logistical_sorter)Logistical Sorter$(/l) $(li)$(l:machines/oredictionificator)Oredictionificator$(/l) $(br)and any machine with configurable sides.
